query:
query Product($id: Int!) {
  product(id: $id) {
    ...ProductMinimal
    currentUserInfos {
      ...ProductUserInfos
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

fragment ProductUserInfos on ProductUserInfos {
  dateDone
  hasStartedReview
  isCurrent
  id
  isDone
  isListed
  isRecommended
  isRejected
  isReviewed
  isWished
  productId
  rating
  userId
  numberEpisodeDone
  lastEpisodeDone {
    episodeNumber
    id
    season {
      seasonNumber
      id
      episodes {
        title
        id
        episodeNumber
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  gameSystem {
    id
    label
    __typename
  }
  review {
    url
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

fragment ProductMinimal on Product {
  ...CommonProductMinimalInfos
  ...ProductProfessions
  __typename
}

fragment CommonProductMinimalInfos on Product {
  ...ProductNano
  category
  channel
  dateCreation
  dateLastUpdate
  dateRelease
  dateReleaseEarlyAccess
  dateReleaseJP
  dateReleaseOriginal
  dateReleaseUS
  displayedYear
  duration
  episodeNumber
  frenchReleaseDate
  listCount
  numberOfEpisodes
  numberOfSeasons
  originalRun
  originalTitle
  parentTvShowId
  productionStatus
  retailReleaseDate
  seasonId
  seasonNumber
  subtitle
  synopsis
  url
  tvChannel {
    name
    url
    __typename
  }
  countries {
    id
    name
    __typename
  }
  franchises {
    id
    label
    slug
    url
    __typename
  }
  gameSystems {
    id
    label
    __typename
  }
  genresInfos {
    id
    label
    slug
    url
    __typename
  }
  isbn
  medias(backdropSize: "1200") {
    randomBackdrop
    backdrop
    picture
    screenshot
    videos {
      id
      image
      provider
      type
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  soundtracks {
    id
    title
    url
    __typename
  }
  stats {
    currentCount
    ratingCount
    recommendCount
    reviewCount
    wishCount
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

fragment ProductNano on Product {
  id
  rating
  slug
  title
  universe
  url
  yearOfProduction
  medias(backdropSize: "1200") {
    backdrop
    picture
    screenshot
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

fragment ProductProfessions on Product {
  actors {
    name
    person_id
    url
    __typename
  }
  artists {
    name
    person_id
    url
    __typename
  }
  authors {
    name
    person_id
    url
    __typename
  }
  tvChannel {
    name
    url
    __typename
  }
  creators {
    name
    person_id
    url
    __typename
  }
  developers {
    name
    person_id
    url
    __typename
  }
  directors {
    name
    person_id
    url
    __typename
  }
  distributors {
    name
    person_id
    url
    __typename
  }
  illustrators {
    name
    person_id
    url
    __typename
  }
  musicLabels {
    name
    person_id
    url
    __typename
  }
  pencillers {
    name
    person_id
    url
    __typename
  }
  producers {
    name
    person_id
    url
    __typename
  }
  publishers {
    name
    person_id
    url
    __typename
  }
  translators {
    name
    person_id
    url
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}
